content.rendered:
Despite our differences, we all have one thing in common… our love for food. One of the fun ways to learn and appreciate cultural diversity is through tasting and cooking delicious dishes from around the world. Alticor Inc employees across the company share their unique cultural dishes that are significant to them. From Pirogi to Fresco de Ensalada, each recipe is unique and fun to make. Recipes from places like Germany, Thailand and Mexico are compiled in this employee “Cultural Cuisine Cookbook.”

Now get in the kitchen, tighten that apron and get to cookin’! Download the full cookbook here.
